sense.def:
A plough
je veliko kmečko orodje z ostrimi ploščami, ki ga vlečemo po zemlji, da jo obrnemo, preden jo posejemo ali zasadimo.

To plough an area of land
pomeni obračati zemljo s plugom.

seg.quote: A small tractor can plough an acre in six to nine hours.

sense.def:
To plough on
ali
to plough through a task
pomeni iti naprej ali nadaljevati z delom, da bi ga dokončali, čeprav se moramo za to zelo potruditi;

seg.quote: The fighters ploughed on to their destination airfields.

sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
ploughs into another thing
, se zaleti v drugo.

seg.quote: The car wavered crazily before ploughing into the bank.

sense.def:
To plough money into a business
pomeni vložiti veliko denarja v neki posel.

seg.quote: ...the huge sums of money which were ploughed into computing.

sense.def:
Kadar travnato zemljišče
is ploughed up
, vanj s plugom zarežemo brazde in zemljo obrnemo.
